summary: This is an email exchange between two FBI agents, one in New York and one in Paris, regarding the Epstein case. The Paris-based agent is new and reaching out to touch base about the case.

persons.name: SSA - FBI New York
persons.context: The recipient of an email from a new FBI agent in Paris regarding the Epstein case, responding to schedule a call.

events.title: FBI agents coordinate on Epstein case
events.description: A new FBI agent in Paris contacts an FBI agent in New York to touch base regarding the Epstein case and schedules a call.

keyFacts: An FBI agent based in Paris was newly assigned and replacing someone in relation to the Epstein case.
The Paris-based agent reached out to an FBI agent in New York to coordinate on the Epstein case in September 2019.
The communication indicates ongoing FBI investigation and international coordination regarding the Epstein case after his death.
